column1: SERVICES will be held on Friday
column3: 2015 at 1:00 p.m. in the Panguitch Stake Center - FRIENDS MAY CALL on Thursday
column5: 2015 at the Stake Center from 6-8:00 p.m. and also prior to services on Friday from 11:00-12:30 - BURIAL WILL BE in the Panguitch Cemetery - FUNERAL DIRECTORS: Magleby Mortuary
